recipe.title: Tossed Salad
recipe.canned_item: Garbanzo Beans, Pears, Mandarin Oranges or Beets
recipe.tip: Add a can of fruit or beets to summer salads for extra flavor and nutrition. Or add canned beans for increased protein and fiber.

recipe.title: Chili
recipe.canned_item: Canned Chicken, Beans, Green Chilies or Black-eyed Peas
recipe.tip: Simmer chili with any of these additional ingredients for added flavor and nutrition.

recipe.title: Nachos
recipe.canned_item: Drained, Diced Tomatoes, Black Beans or Olives
recipe.tip: Top your nachos with these additional ingredients for an even tastier Southwest dish.

recipe.title: Pasta
recipe.canned_item: Mushrooms, Cannellini Beans or Drained Tuna
recipe.tip: Toss any of these mix-ins into your favorite pasta for added nutrition and flavor boost.

recipe.title: Baked Chicken
recipe.tip: Add canned vegetables to baked chicken pieces in the last 15 minutes of cooking for a one-dish meal that takes no extra time.

recipe.title: Meatloaf
recipe.canned_item: Mushrooms, Carrots, Tomatoes or Green Beans
recipe.tip:
Finely chop these ingredients
and mix in with ground beef
before baking for extra flavor
and nutrition.

recipe.title: Mashed Potatoes
recipe.canned_item: Sweet Potatoes, Pumpkin, Carrots or Spinach
recipe.tip: Change up plain old mashed potatoes with canned vegetables for added color, flavor and nutrients.

recipe.title: Rice
recipe.canned_item:
Olives, Black Beans, Kidney Beans
or Mixed Vegetables
recipe.tip: Prepare rice with low-sodium/low-fat broth to boost flavor, then mix in olives or your favorite vegetables or beans for added color and nutrition.

recipe.title: Macaroni and Cheese
recipe.tip: Combine prepared mac and cheese with corn, tuna or ham in a 9x13" baking dish; top with bread crumbs and bake until golden brown.

recipe.title: Cake
recipe.tip: Experiment. Purée any canned vegetable to replace some of the water or oil in your favorite cake recipe. Results will be more nutritious, delicious and moist.

recipe.title: Smoothies
recipe.tip: For a quick and tasty smoothie, blend a can of your favorite canned fruit in its own juice with some low-fat yogurt and ice cubes.

recipe.title: Sundaes
recipe.tip: Top ice cream with hot fudge and your favorite drained, canned fruit for a special take on a classic dessert.
